users.name: zukunft.com system
users.description: the internal zukunft.com system user mainly used for the log entries of the initial setup and batch jobs; this user is only used by the program code and no interactive login with this user is ever allowed

users.name: zukunft.com local admin
users.description: the fallback zukunft.com admin user that should only be used in a break-glass event to recover other admin users

users.name: zukunft.com system test
users.description: the internal zukunft.com user used for integration tests that should never be shown to the user but is used to check if integration test data is completely removed after the tests

users.name: zukunft.com system test partner
users.description: an internal zukunft.com user used for user sandbox integration tests that should never be shown to the user but is used to check if integration test data is completely removed after the tests

users.name: zukunft.com system test admin
users.description: an internal zukunft.com test user to check the allow for admin users

users.name: zukunft.com system test no admin
users.description: an internal zukunft.com test user to check the deny for normal users
